name: Mansion of Sins and Virtues
description:
The guardian angel and devil of Lucia decides to work together to help her escape a cursed mansions.

This is a visual novel with a twist. You can only influence the choices indirectly, through altering the personality of the main character.

Made for Wowie Jam 4.0 in three days.

The story is inspired by the House of Hell and Angel Friends.

Credits:

  • Made by LajosTueur
  • Game made with Godot
  • Event pictures made with Craiyon
  • Portraits made with Artbreeder
  • Music made with AIVA
  • Royal wallpaper vector created by GarryKillian
  • Brown wood photo created by rawpixel.com
